## useDataTableSource() function

Use the raw source table from a data package without any workflow applied to it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useDataTableSource(pkg: DataTable | undefined): Maybe<TableContainer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pkg | DataTable \| undefined | The data package to load the datasource from |

<b>Returns:</b>

Maybe&lt;TableContainer&gt;
